content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (x=10.5, y=34.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam Engine at position (x=10.5, y=34.5) with status NOT_CONNECTED
- Boiler at position (x=5.5, y=27.0) with status NOT_CONNECTED
- Offshore Pump at position (x=-7.5, y=25.5) with status WORKING
- Offshore Pump at position (x=0.5, y=30.5) with status WORKING
- PipeGroup connecting various positions to facilitate fluid movement

### Iron Plate Production Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (x=15.0, y=0.0) with status NO_INGREDIENTS
- Inserter at position (x=17.5, y=0.5) with status NO_POWER
- Inserter at position (x=16.5, y=0.5) with status NO_POWER
- Wooden Chest at position (x=5.5, y=0.5) and (x=18.5, y=0.5)

### Fluid Transport System
Consists of multiple PipeGroups:
- PipeGroup at position (x=-14.5, y=14.5) with status EMPTY
- PipeGroup at position (x=-14.5, y=17.5) with fluid WATER and status WORKING
- Additional PipeGroups facilitating fluid transport across various positions

### Electricity Network
- ElectricityGroup with poles at various positions, voltage 0

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors with Boiler and Steam Engine Connections
- Ensure that the boiler and steam engine are properly connected to the fluid system and electricity network to avoid the NOT_CONNECTED status.

### Errors with Inserter Power Supply
- Make sure that inserters are connected to a power source to prevent the NO_POWER status.

### Errors with Fluid System Connections
- Verify that all pipes and fluid connections are properly established to avoid EMPTY or NOT_CONNECTED statuses in the fluid transport system.

### Errors with Furnace Operations
- Ensure that the stone furnace has the necessary ingredients to avoid the NO_INGREDIENTS status.

### Repeated Reconnection Attempts
- Avoid repeatedly attempting to reconnect entities without resolving underlying connection issues, as this can lead to inefficiencies.
